alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:08AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Salle County through 745 AM CDT... At 708 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grand Ridge, or 7 miles south of Ottawa, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ottawa, Streator, Marseilles, Sheridan, Seneca, Serena, Millington, Dayton, Ransom, Norway and Wedron. Including the following interstate... I-80 between mile markers 92 and 102. This includes... Illini State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Illinois.
